description:
Law and Kid are having a tough battle against a formidable Emperor of the Sea, Big Mom. However, when they decide to work collaboratively and use their awakened Devil Fruit powers, they see the possibility of taking down the old generation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Countercharge! Law and Kid`s Return-Attack Combination
Gegenangriff! – Die Vergeltungsallianz von Law und Kid
Gyakushuu! Law to Kid no Hangeki Doumei
La contre-attaque. Law et Kidd sonnent la révolte !
逆襲! ローとキッドの反撃同盟
